name: Using Passivhaus to help obtain planning consent and the tools needed for certification
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session covers how Passivhaus can be utilised to help obtain planning consent. It also looks at how the Passivhaus Planning Package works as a design and compliance tool and how it integrates with UK building regulations and the code for sustainable homes.

presentations.name: Case study - retrofit and new-build
presentations.speakers: Janet Cotterell, Director, Passivhaus Homes and Co-Author, 'The Passivhaus Handbook'

presentations.name: Passivhaus and compliance tools - exploring how PHPP integrates with Part L and BREEAM
presentations.speakers:
Melissa Taylor, Passivhaus Trust
Nick Grant, Passivhaus Trust

presentations.name: Case study - retrofit in a conservation area
